ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I almost got killed by Gorenaire when I was watching a guild fight her. I was totally unbuffed and when her AE hit me it dropped me well under 30% life so I
ygData.messageBody:
I almost got killed by Gorenaire when I was watching a guild fight her. I
was totally unbuffed and when her AE hit me it dropped me well under 30%
life so I hauled ass. =) She cons kindly to me, and never agrroed me. I'm
not sure what caused her to go aggro on you. During downtime in VP some
friends of mine decided to duel (don't EVER do this in VP), and Hoshkar, who
is kindly to me, stand right on top of me and kill them. His AE hit me HARD,
but he walked away after my friends died w/out aggroing me. *shrug*

Sartori{Legion}
57th Troubador
Veeshan


>Side question about Gorenaire. I was fighting along the castle north wall
>in Dreads when a Gorenaire raid was going on. I conned the dragon and I
>was
>either warmly or amiable. So I got close to take some screenshots since
>this was the first time I had ever seen a dragon. I had Selos up and was
>standing right in front of Gorenaire when she decided to swat me. Before I
>realized what was going on, I was back at my bind point.
>
>So did I die to a bug or will Gorenaire, once aggroed, attack anyone near
>her, even if they weren't involved in the attack? BTW I was not in wolf
>form nor was I grouped with anyone at the time who had pets (which I have
>been told will cause her to attack you).
Galtin of E'ci>
